about.part1: My name is Eric Yang (ShunYu Yang). I come from Kaohsiung, Taiwan and I graduated from Shih Chien University. I'm majoring in computer science and design.
about.part2: I began to learn programming languages when I was a college student. I learned how to code C# for Unity and I used Unity to create a 2D and 3D game with a team. I also learned how to build a website.
about.part3: I enjoy coding.I hope users have great experience when they visited website what i did.

headline.part3: Focus on learning Javascript and front end knowledge.

skill.html: I use Semantic Elements when I building a website
skill.css: I know what breakpoint is and I also know what responsive web design is.I use SASS as my CSS preprocessor. I can use bootstrap or other UI library in my project.
skill.javascript: I know what Webpack is and I know how to use it. I can fetch data from a database. I also use other library when I'm building a website.
skill.vuejs: I can build a website with Vuejs. My state container is Vuex and routing with Vue Router
skill.react: I use function component with hooks and routing with react-router-dom. Also, I use redux as my state containerã€‚

work1.title: NewYorkTimes API
work1.desc: I use Axios to fetch data. When the view is scrolling, the more news will be shown in the view. I didn't use any library in this project

work2.title: Online Order
work2.desc: This project is building with Vuejs. First, I fetching data with Axios and pass the data to Vuex. And I use LocalStorage to save list what user add to the shopping cart.

work3.title: Cryptocurrencies
work3.desc: I use Axios to get data from CoinGecko API and the data display in a bootstrap table. The bar charts are drawing with C3js.
